overview:
Edmardo Galli is acknowledged as a pioneer in the development of the Internet business in Brazil. Founded his first company in 1996 - an interactive agency (10â€™Minutos Interactive) which later has become a recognized brand in the Brazilian digital market.

Since 2002, Edmardo Galli runs his own seed investor company â€“ The Galli Group â€“ responsible for creating and nurturing recognized digital media companies such as SmartKids, 10â€™Minutos, Katabum!, Media Rights, Xsport MKT., among others.

Simultaneously to the digital market, Galli has a successful artistic career in Brazil. As a musician, took part in two of the most successful pop bands in Brazil - Herois da Resistencia and Hanoi-Hanoi - achieving gold discs awards and several #1 hits on the national charts.
